Name: Brick Breaker Heart Collector
About the game: A Breakout style arcade game where you get to collect hearts for bonus points and extra lives while destroying the bricks. Unlock cool power ups and not so cool power downs as you progress through the game. Features: Play it with your keyboard, the mouse or a gamepad (recommended). 100 levels to play. 14 power ups / power downs to unlock. Initially slow and easy, then gradually more challenging. All the power ups and power downs you unlock will remain unlocked when you start a new game. The ball's speed is slightly increased each time it bounces off a destructible brick.
